feed.title: Zitnik Lab
feed.subtitle: Harvard Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: New Network Principle for Molecular Phenotypes

link.title: New Network Principle for Molecular Phenotypes

entry.content: New paper introducing mutual interactor-based GNN for molecular phenotype prediction at PSB. Project website.
entry.summary: New paper introducing mutual interactor-based GNN for molecular phenotype prediction at PSB. Project website.

entry.title: Can we shorten rare disease diagnostic odyssey?

link.title: Can we shorten rare disease diagnostic odyssey?

entry.content: New preprint! Geometric deep learning for diagnosing patients with rare genetic diseases. Implications for the use of deep learning on datasets with very few labels. Thankful for this collaboration with Zak Lab. Project website.
entry.summary: New preprint! Geometric deep learning for diagnosing patients with rare genetic diseases. Implications for the use of deep learning on datasets with very few labels. Thankful for this collaboration with Zak Lab. Project website.

entry.title: Can AI transform the way we discover new drugs?

link.title: Can AI transform the way we discover new drugs?

entry.content: Our conversation with Harvard Medicine News highlights recent developments and new features in Therapeutics Data Commons.
entry.summary: Our conversation with Harvard Medicine News highlights recent developments and new features in Therapeutics Data Commons.

entry.title: New Paper in Nature Biomedical Engineering

link.title: New Paper in Nature Biomedical Engineering

entry.content: New paper on graph representation learning in biomedicine and healthcare published in Nature Biomedical Engineering.
entry.summary: New paper on graph representation learning in biomedicine and healthcare published in Nature Biomedical Engineering.

entry.title: New Paper in Nature Chemical Biology

link.title: New Paper in Nature Chemical Biology

entry.content: Our paper on artificial intelligence foundation for therapeutic science is published in Nature Chemical Biology.
entry.summary: Our paper on artificial intelligence foundation for therapeutic science is published in Nature Chemical Biology.

entry.title: Self-Supervised Pre-Training at NeurIPS 2022
entry.content: New paper on self-supervised contrastive pre-training accepted at NeurIPS 2022. Project page. Thankful for this collaboration with the Lincoln National Laboratory.
entry.summary: New paper on self-supervised contrastive pre-training accepted at NeurIPS 2022. Project page. Thankful for this collaboration with the Lincoln National Laboratory.

entry.title: Best Paper Honorable Mention Award at IEEE VIS

link.title: Best Paper Honorable Mention Award at IEEE VIS

entry.content: Our paper on user-centric AI of drug repurposing received the Best Paper Honorable Mention Award at IEEE VIS 2022. Thankful for this collaboration with Gehlenborg Lab.
entry.summary: Our paper on user-centric AI of drug repurposing received the Best Paper Honorable Mention Award at IEEE VIS 2022. Thankful for this collaboration with Gehlenborg Lab.

entry.title: Multimodal Representation Learning with Graphs
entry.content: New preprint! We present the blueprint for graph-centric multimodal learning.
entry.summary: New preprint! We present the blueprint for graph-centric multimodal learning.

entry.title: On Graph AI for Precision Medicine

link.title: On Graph AI for Precision Medicine

entry.content: The recording of our tutorial on using graph AI to advance precision medicine is available. Tune into four hours of interactive lectures about state-of-the-art graph AI methods and applications in precision medicine.
entry.summary: The recording of our tutorial on using graph AI to advance precision medicine is available. Tune into four hours of interactive lectures about state-of-the-art graph AI methods and applications in precision medicine.

entry.title: Evaluating Explainability for GNNs
entry.content: New preprint! We introduce a resource for broad evaluation of the quality and reliability of GNN explanations, addressing challenges and providing solutions for GNN explainability. Project website.
entry.summary: New preprint! We introduce a resource for broad evaluation of the quality and reliability of GNN explanations, addressing challenges and providing solutions for GNN explainability. Project website.
